For example, code like this will create a mixed JSONArray, some items wrapped, others not:,"somebean[] myarr = new somebean[]{ new somebean(1), new somebean(2) }
jarr.putall(new somebean[]{ new somebean(3), new somebean(4) })
column2: ,somebean[] myarr = new somebean[]{ new somebean(1), new somebean(2) }
column3: // these will be wrapped jsonarray jarr = new jsonarray(myarr)
column4: // these will not be wrapped jarr.putall(new somebean[]{ new somebean(3), new somebean(4) })
